name: The Great Escape
paragraphs: You and your companion hatch a plan to create a diversion using some of the equipment in the lab. As you're setting up, one of the other patients wakes up and starts screaming at the top of their lungs, ruining your plan. You scramble to improvise and end up accidentally activating a strange device that causes a massive explosion.

You and your companion wake up outside the building, covered in soot and bruises. As you dust yourselves off, you see a group of police officers approaching you. But instead of arresting you, they thank you for stopping the experiment and saving countless lives. You exchange a relieved smile with your companion, knowing that you'll never forget this crazy adventure.
